description: Cash payments to Manx teachers to settle dispute branded '30 pieces of silver', by largest union.
title: Isle of Man teachers' pay deal: One-off payments 'do not resolve dispute'
title_page: Isle of Man teachers' pay deal: One-off payments 'do not resolve dispute' - BBC News
maintext: He said teachers' take home pay was currently 30% below where it would have been had it kept pace with Manx inflation and the agreement did not "bind the employer to commit to addressing any future erosion".
